item.description:
We celebrate the holiday of birth of Shinran Shonin (Gotan-e), the founder and foremost teacher of Shin Buddhism, and the American holiday of Memorial Day, with an annual community potluck picnic at a local park in Middletown. For members and friends, and other guests. Includes games, plenty food and good people. A good event for families.

 

Visit our main website  at www.bffct.net for Calendar and more information on our beliefs and practices.

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
item.how_to_find_us: Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
item.why: .... enjoy a warm spring day with food, drink and nice people.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Buddhist Meetup Group - Memorial Day Picnic - Gotan-e
